pkgmetadata.longdescription: Detects Fraud in Online Surveys by Tracing, Scoring, and Visualizing IP Addresses // Takes an array of IPs and the keys for the services the user wishes to use (IP Hub, IP Intel, and Proxycheck), and passes these to all respective APIs. Returns a dataframe with the IP addresses (used for merging), country, ISP, labels for non-US IP Addresses, VPS use, and recommendations for blocking. The package also provides optional visualization tools for checking the distributions.
